articles.title: Snap bans on candy, soda to start in five US states, limiting food-aid purchases - BBC
articles.description: West Virginia, Utah, Indiana, Iowa and Nebraska will have new rules for shopping with government food benefits.
articles.content:
Several US states are set to ban items like soda and candy for Americans who rely on government benefits to buy food.
The bans will start New Years Day in five states - West Virginia, Utah, Indiana,… [+1933 chars]
